bike.description: ZR 9000 Alloy™ in a long-travel, full-suspension design that quickly adjusts to match the terrain. Lighter than titanium, stronger than steel.

components.description: RockShox Psylo C, U-Turn, HC2 damping, travel gradients, 80/125mm travel

Bontrager Select Disc: Machined rims welded for strength; OSB rear rim provides good stiffness for any size rider; Hi-Lo ATB rear hub design w/excellent spoke bracing angles for improved lateral wheel rigidity; Cro-Moly skewers; 780 g, 24h front/1045 g, 2
